title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure and points the output folder at a bin directory, which contains more than just .class files, we should confirm that the bin directory can be deleted and then rebuilt.
EB: The system should prompt the user to confirm that the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt when creating a new project and specifying the output folder as a bin directory.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new project.
2. Specify the output folder as a bin directory that contains more than just .class files.
3. Proceed with the creation process.
4. Note that the system should prompt the user to confirm the deletion and rebuilding of the bin directory.
